page.title: 19A Day in the Life of A.Blair
page.content: I unload the car and carry the items we have bought into my storeroom .I have just time to put my car away in the garage when Martin dashes down to tell me the dinner is ready. { 21.30}Martin has just gone to bed _ later than usual but it is the weekend.Usually on a Friday Igo to the Golden Lion for a couple of drinks but it has been a hectic day.I think I will watch TV for another hour or so. {22.00}Tessa my daughter decides to go to bed.I get a can of beer from the fridge and watch TV for another hour or so.Fatigue has set in;the end of another hectic day.Thank goodness it is another 7 days till next Friday. Downstairs for the last time,check all the locks and alarms on the door and so to bed.What did I say in my first paragraph _ "stagger downstairs" _this time I stagger upstairs to bed!!!!!!!!
